price: 10. Kanse laga siiyo Kitaabkiisa dhabarkiisa gadaashiisa,
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man ūtiya kitābahu warāa ẓahrihi
